name: Fate/Grand Order: Epic of Remnant - Deep Sea Cyber-Paradise SE.RA.PH
nutshell: To repair the singularity of the future, the main character, Ryuka Fujimaru, will shift again to lay down a tremendous battle.

name: Put It All in the Ring! Real
Seinen Shoujo yo, Haru wo Musabore
nutshell:
-"At that time, I still didn't know the special meaning behind it."
Katsuyuki, a junior high school student, who has never known love and Haru, the school's madonna, who moved here from Tokyo. In a strange turn of events, the distance between them grows closer… It's beautiful, it's fragile, it's miserable, and it's painful. A coming-of-age mystery spun by the spell of first love.

Mangaka's Twitter

name: Afternoon
nutshell: An extremely short oneshot about a cello lesson.

name: Kageno Datte Seishun Shitai
nutshell:
Meet Kageno, the super dull, glasses wearing, short first year high school girl. She has no friends and envies people who are enjoying their youth. Meet Mitsunaga Youta, the most popular handsome guy in school. Girls constantly confess their love to him, but he has no plans of dating anyone. After a string of events, he decides to ask Kageno to be his fake girlfriend for a month in order to stop the girls from confessing to him in return for his friendship. How will Kageno face all the ordeals that are about to come?
This is the beginning of a love comedy between the school idol and the negative girl.

name: She Is Possessed by the Strongest Evil Spirit
nutshell: Sakanoue Ogamu likes his childhood friend, Kannagi Miko, but the evil spirit haunting her is a cockblock.

name: Psycho Pass - Psycho Pass Yuri Collection (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Collection of Yuri Shorts from Pixiv

name: Purely, Honestly, Immorally Love
nutshell: A young man is starting as the tutor of a Japanese lower house politician's daughter. But this girl means dangerous business.

name: Amakara Gishimai ni Hasamarete Masu
nutshell:
English From Seiga :
One day, Our plain protagonist suddenly got 2 sisters, a big-breasted gentle older sister type and a devilish cute little sister!?
A slightly exciting family romantic comedy! (more boobs and loli cliche)

name: Body Talk
nutshell:
Liar! Liar!
Katana takes home a boy who has no recollection of his past or his name. However, Katana knows more than he's willing to share.


Impossible!
What do these customers have up their sleeve? It just might be "impossible" to believe.


Kushami
Graduated student still sees his sensei, but will they have continued relations?


Sweet Sickness
Medicine, peaches, and special treatment.


Don't Open Your Eyes


Hot Love


DOGS

name: Assault Ramen
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Popular star Nishiki Ayuzawa meets a group of hungry children in a TV studio. He beats up Namiroku Kishi, who was a big star five years ago but has since fallen from grace, and tells him that Namiroku is the children's father. He punches out Namiroku and the children and forces Namiroku to eat ramen at his father's food stall, "Kakuchi Ramen". Tabe's henchmen try to bring down Ayuzawa, and make a gang of delinquents attack the "assault ramen". ......?
An early work of Weekly Shonen Jump.

name: Bicco.
nutshell:
A struggling manga artist has a chance encounter with a strange girl named Bicco.
Links:

Author's Twitter

name: Rakugaki Manga
nutshell: A short twitter series by @udon0531.

name: The Underdog
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Mystery,Full Color
nutshell: We were all underdogs at one point of our lives. Sad but true but now it is time for some payback …

name: The surviving girl and the devil's egg (Color Version)
A Toast to Your Eyes
nutshell:
Scarlett, who has lost her lover six times to her friend, had always believed and forgiven her friend's words that are pitiful yet beautiful.
"It was for you, Scarlett. Haven't you always said that any man who can get taken away easily isn't yours?"
But as soon as the veil falls off, Scarlett finally decides to take revenge on her friend.
And soon, in front of her friend , she kisses her friend's fiancé deeply.
"I'm the one who is sorry for not seeing your evil intentions, but you shouldn't have thought that I'd stay a idiot forever."
All of these are revenge from me.
Quiet and promiscuous.
Note: This is an one-shot, promotional manhwa for the novel of the same name.

name: Giant Killing - Akasaki-shi's Secret (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Gino x Akasaki

name: Betrayalism Romance
nutshell: Bae Shinju, Jang Maro, Yoo Hana, and Cho Jihoon were close friends since elementary school. During their 2nd year of High School, Maro chooses to confess to Shinju. Shinju's refusal to respond to Maro out of concern for their friendships came across as a rejection. But... On that very day, Jihoon and Hana began dating. "This is a betrayal!" "A betrayal!"

name: Hippocrate In Another World
nutshell: The genius doctor Jiu Ye Sikong reborn in another world and encountered a group of handsome princes, all of who are falling in love with Jiu Ye. In order to get back to the where she used to be, Jiu Ye spared every effort to commit suicide, which turned out to be in vain…She could do nothing but cure people with her medical skills in the new world…

name: Osomatsu-san - O kitsune-sama wa hakanaki hi no yume o miru (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Osomatsu Matsuno x Ichimatsu Matsuno

name: Free! - Sunege Mo Aishite (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Haru, después de recapitular un suceso importante, llega a la conclusión de que en realidad no está soñando…

name: Ami! Nonstop
nutshell:
Ami is a normal school girl. One day with her friends, she got stopped for an interview by a camera crew who thought Ami was really cute.
Shortly afterwards, Ami meets a blond boy who goes to her school named Nozomu. He seems to show some interest in her too. However, after she went to the 'Darwin', a group of two boy singers, concert, she met another Nozomu.
Very soon after the encounter with Darwin, she then got roped into the entertainment world as there were many people already interested in her from her live interview, who she later also became interested in.

name: Oboreru Kemono no Koibito
nutshell: Kazuki undergoes training to become the heir of the company, per his father's instruction, which finally drives Chiharu to the brink of insanity. How far would Chiharu go and how much could Kazuki tolerate from his lover?

name: Phoenix of Chaos
nutshell: The Phoenix of Chaos descended upon the world with the power to burn everything down to ashes which inflicted terror for centuries. It was the ruler of Heaven and Earth! When the crown prince of the Chaos Phoenix was reincarnated, he stirred up trouble throughout the world. The king had been reborn to start his journey afresh!

name: Sword Art Online 4-koma
nutshell: 4-koma with Sword Art Online characters.

name: Pink to Gray
nutshell: “Pink to Gray” tells the story of two best friends who entered the entertainment industry . However, one became a star while the other gets left behind to supporting roles.
